ready_to_earn: Ready to see what you can earn?
join_thousands: Join thousands of users already earning free Bitcoin
hero_main_heading: Turn your free time into free Bitcoin
hero_subheading: Earn up to $596 USD per offer
how_it_works_heading: Start earning free crypto within minutes!
choose_offer_desc: Take your pick from the tasks on the earn page. We list the best offers from companies who want to advertise their apps, surveys, and products.
complete_offer_desc: Most offers are very simple and have already earned money for thousands of people. Most offers payout their first rewards within a few minutes.
get_paid_instantly_desc: Once verified, your earnings are added to your account instantly. Withdraw via Bitcoin, LiteCoin, Doge or Dash.
level_up_desc: Climb ranks. Unlock crypto rewards. From Hodler to Cryptolord, you'll earn spins, boosts, and more.
avg_cashout_month: Avg. cash out for new users this month.
delete_account_confirmation_message: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account? This action cannot be undone and all your data will be permanently removed.

user_info_description: This widget displays authenticated user information from the whoami API. It automatically handles loading states, error handling, and can be easily integrated into any screen.
compact_description: Minimal padding and custom decoration for sidebar or drawer usage.
custom_description: Custom gradient background matching app theme.
import_widget: Import the UserInfoWidget in your page or screen.
add_widget: Add the widget to your widget tree with desired configuration.
customize_styling: Customize styling using decoration and padding properties.
handle_states: The widget automatically handles loading, error, and empty states.
level_rewards_subtitle: Level up as you earn & unlock new rewards.
level_rewards_points_description: 250 points to next level. You earn 1 point for every 10 Coins earned.
reward_offer_boost_subtitle: No boost on offers or surveys.
level_progress_description: 250 points to next level. You earn 1 point for every 10 Coins earned.
profile_2fa_description: We noticed you do not have two-factor authentication enabled. We recommend you enable 2FA to keep your account secure.
profile_username_note: Your username can only be changed once every 30 days.
profile_interest_description: Your account will earn 5% interest when you have more than 35,000 Coins. Interest is paid weekly.
security_enable_2fa_desc: A code will be sent to your email every time you login with a new device.
security_enable_pin_desc: You will need to enter a 4 digit pin code when confirming important actions.
security_2fa_app_desc: Two-factor authentication authenticator apps add an extra layer of security to your account. When you login on a new device you will have to enter a time sensitive 6 digit code.
2fa_unknown_device_subtitle: We noticed you are logging in from an unknown device.
2fa_instruction: Please enter the security code from your authenticator app.
2fa_support_text: If you do not have your security code, please
turnstile_token_missing: Security verification token is missing. Please try again.
2fa_dialog_body_text: Using an authenticator app like Google Authenticator, Microsoft Authenticator, Authy, or 1Password, scan the QR code. It will generate a 6 digit code for you to enter below.
2fa_dialog_note_text: If you having trouble using the QR code, select manual entry on your app, and enter your username and the code:
setup_2fa_instructions: Set up two-factor authentication to secure your account
please_wait: Please wait while we verify your code...
2fa_extra_security: Add an extra layer of security to your account
2fa_enabled_desc: Your account is protected with two-factor authentication. You will need to enter a 6-digit code when logging in from new devices.
2fa_disabled_desc: Enable two-factor authentication to add an extra layer of security to your account. You will need to enter a time-sensitive 6-digit code when logging in.
2fa_initial_desc: Check your two-factor authentication status to see if your account is protected with an extra layer of security.
check_2fa_status_description: Check your 2FA status to see if your account is protected
disable_2fa_warning_message: Disabling two-factor authentication will make your account less secure. Are you sure you want to continue?
disable_2fa_security_note: Your account will be protected only by your password.
2fa_disabled_successfully: 2FA has been successfully disabled for your account.
2fa_login_verification_subtitle: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app to complete your login.
2fa_login_info: Open your authenticator app to get the code.
welcome_description:
Complete this short tutorial for a special welcome tutorial bonus.

It will only take a minute!
free_spins_description:
Every day or week you login, your account will be awarded daily 'Free Spins' and weekly 'Mystery Boxes'.

The number you receive depends on your account level.
daily_streak_description:
Every day you login and earn a minimum number of Coins, you can claim your daily streak.

The more consecutive days you claim your streak, the bigger the reward!

Higher account levels also get bigger rewards.
ptc_ads_description:
View PTC Ads for quick, short ads to boost your daily Coin total.

The ad will open in a new tab, so make sure it stays open until the timer is done!
missions_description:
You will find hundreds of missions and quests to complete in the 'Missions' section of the website.

Completing missions and quests is a great way to earn bonus Coins.

Check the Earn → 'Bonus Missions' page for details.
offers_description:
Completing offers is one of the best ways to earn Coins on GigaFaucet.

Offers can be found in the 'Earn' section of the website.

There are many different types of offers available. Be sure to check them out for the ones that work best for you.
xp_description:
Every time you complete an offer, play the multiplier, or watch a video, etc., you will earn XP (Experience Points).

Earning XP will level up your account, unlocking more features and bigger rewards.

You can find your account level on your Profile or Bonuses page.
withdraw_description:
You can withdraw your Coins once you hit a minimum of 30,000 Coins.

To withdraw, go to Account → 'Cash Out' and select your preferred withdrawal method.

Follow the instructions to complete your withdrawal.
all_set_description:
You are now ready to start earning Coins on GigaFaucet!

Remember to check back daily for your bonus spins and mystery boxes, and complete offers and missions to maximize your earnings.

Good luck and have fun!
tutorial_reward_desc: Claim 3 Bonus Spins and 2 Mystery Boxes
referrals_manage_desc: Share GigaFaucet with your friends & family to earn up to 25% on each referral.
referrals_manage_help: If you have any questions, please visit our Help Page.
referrals_link_desc: Share your link on social media, blogs, or PTC websites etc. Any users that sign up through your link will earn you cash!
referrals_leaderboard_desc: The leaderboard is updated every 15 minutes.
referrals_details_desc: Referral contest runs each month and is paid at the end of each month. Earn entries for each referred user.
referrals_users_desc: View users you have referred to GigaFaucet
referral_get_started_desc: Simply refer users to GigaFaucet using your custom referral link. They will be automatically tracked and attributed to you if they sign up any time within 30 days.
referral_point_1: You will earn 25% of every referrals faucet claims FOR LIFE.
referral_point_2: You will also earn 10% of any of your referrals offer wall earnings.
referral_point_3: There is no limit to the number of referrals you can send.
referral_point_4: Referrals on the same device or in the same household are NOT allowed and will not be counted as referrals.
referral_warning: IMPORTANT: Invalid, fake or duplicate referrals will not be counted. Your account may be terminated and all Coins forfeited if you are found to be sending invalid referrals.
referral_banner_note: Click to copy the code and use these banners on your website or blog to attract referrals.
referral_get_started_warning: IMPORTANT: Invalid, fake or duplicate referrals will not be counted. Your account may be terminated and all Coins forfeited if you are found to be sending invalid referrals. We have automated measures to detect and prevent invalid referrals. You’ve been warned.

and community contests.

event_invite_friends_win_coins: Invite your friends and win coins for lifetime!

change_your_country_note: You can change your country only 3 times per year.

show_stats_description: When enabled, your account stats are shown on your profile. Enabled by default.
anonymous_contests_description: When enabled, your account appears anonymously in contest rankings. Off by default.
